user.title: Choose Connection Mode
user.description: Select how you want to connect to Hydro-Québec

data_description.auth_mode: Portal Mode: Sign in for full account access. OpenData Mode: Use public data only (no login required)

data_description.contract_name: A friendly name for this contract (e.g., 'Home', 'Cottage')

configure_preheat.title: Configure Pre-heat Duration
configure_preheat.description: Configure when to trigger pre-heating alerts for {rate_name}

data_description.preheat_duration_minutes: Duration before critical peak events to trigger pre-heating (0-240 minutes, default: 120)

calendar.title: Calendar Integration (Optional)
calendar.description: Automatically create calendar events for critical peak periods for {contract_name}. Events will use standardized French titles for blueprint compatibility.

data_description.calendar_entity_id: Select a calendar entity to create peak events. Leave empty to skip calendar integration.

calendar_opendata.title: Calendar Integration (Optional)
calendar_opendata.description: Automatically create calendar events for critical peak periods for {contract_name}. Events will use standardized French titles for blueprint compatibility.

data_description.calendar_entity_id: Select a calendar entity to create peak events. Leave empty to skip calendar integration.

import_history.title: Import Consumption History
import_history.description: How many days of consumption history would you like to import? The last 30 days will be synced automatically. Maximum available history is 800 days. Set to 0 to skip additional history import. The import runs in the background and may take several minutes.

data_description.history_days: Number of days to import (0-800). Set to 0 to sync only the last 30 days, or enter a value for older history.

opendata.title: OpenData Mode - Select Sector
opendata.description: Configure monitoring using public data (no login required). First, select your customer sector.

data_description.sector: Select whether you are a residential or commercial customer

opendata_offer.title: OpenData Mode - Select Rate
opendata_offer.description: Select your electricity rate plan for {sector} customers. Available options are fetched from Hydro-Québec's public API.

data_description.rate_selection: Select your electricity rate plan from available options
